A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was it the hype and anticipation that let me down? I left this movie with more questions than I wanted. And the Disney humor doesn’t belong in this universe. I don’t mind the humor. I don’t think the Disney humor is needed. If you saw the movie then you know what I’m talking about. This movie had so many twist and turns that just led to nowhere. The feeling I got from this movie is the same feeling I got after watching The Force Awakens. A feeling of I’ve seen this before just done differently. TFA I give it a pass of mirroring A New Hope for the sake of cleansing our palette from Episodes 1-3. However there was no reason to do the same for this one. I know this reads as a very negative review. But Star Wars for me was always about hope against difficult odds. And this one just felt so flat almost like trudging through mud with no sense of hope.
